Doctor2: I am sorry to tell you that I have bad news
Doctor3: Do you remember why we did the biopsy?
Doctor4: Judging from what I know of you, you seem to be a person who wants to know what is there irrespective of how serious the condition is
Doctor5: I am sorry. I wish I had better news. The biopsy showed what we were afraid of cancer
Doctor7: There may be treatment for it. The oncologist will drop by shortly to explain to you the treatment plan. Do not hesitate to ask questions.
